function createThunkMiddleware(extraArgument){const middleware=_ref=>{let{dispatch,getState}=_ref;return next=>action=>{if(typeof action==="function"){return action(dispatch,getState,extraArgument);}return next(action);};};return middleware;}var thunk=createThunkMiddleware();var withExtraArgument=createThunkMiddleware;export{thunk,withExtraArgument};
